official_title: A bill to authorize the flood control project for Green Brook, Raritan River Basin, New Jersey.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to carry out the project for flood control on Green Brook, Raritan River Basin, New Jersey.
